content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia Müller, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. Can you provide me with an initial offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me the current rental price for the apartment?

I would like to rent the apartment for 450 Euros per month. Is that acceptable for you?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I apologize, but I am unable to provide you with the current rental price for the apartment. However, I am open to discussing the rental price with you. I am interested in maximizing my gains, so I am willing to negotiate with you to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Can you provide me with any additional information or requirements that you have for the rental agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for a dependable and responsible tenant. I would like to have a one-year rental agreement with a one-month notice period. I also expect the tenant to pay the rent on time and take care of the apartment. Is that acceptable for you?

I would like to rent the apartment for 500 Euros per month. I believe that is a fair rental price for the size and location of the apartment. Is that acceptable for you?

I am open to negotiating the rental price, but I would like to have a clear and fair agreement in place before signing the rental contract.

I am interested in signing the rental contract and moving in as soon as possible. Can you provide me with a copy of the rental contract to review and sign?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment, Emilia. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and have a clear and fair agreement in place.

Regarding your requirements, I am open to a one-year rental agreement with a one-month notice period, as long as the rental price is reasonable. I would also expect the tenant to take care of the apartment and pay the rent on time.

I understand that you would like to rent the apartment for 500 Euros per month, which is a reasonable rental price for the size and location of the apartment. However, I am willing to negotiate with you to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I agree to the rental price of 500 Euros per month. Please provide me with a copy of the rental contract to review and sign. Once I have reviewed the contract, I can provide you with a date for moving in.
name: Heinrich Heine
